    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicTool

        public TopicTool()

    • Method Detail

      • getBlog

        public BlogData getBlog(Number blogId)
        Return the details of a topic, the properties will not be contained.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic
        Returns:
        a list item with details or null if the blog does not exist or the user is not allowed to read it

      • getBlogRole

        public String getBlogRole(Long blogId)
        Parameters:
        blogId - The id of the blog to test.
        Returns:
        The role of the current user for the given blog, will be "NONE" if the blog does not exist or the user has no access.

      • getDefaultBlog

        public Blog getDefaultBlog()
        Returns:
        The default topic.

      • getDefaultBlogId

        public Long getDefaultBlogId()
        Returns:
        The id of the default blog, or empty string if there is none.

      • getDefaultBlogRole

        public String getDefaultBlogRole()
        Returns:
        The role of the current user for the default blog. Result will be "NONE" if the user has no access to that topic.

      • getMinimalBlogInfo

        public MinimalBlogData getMinimalBlogInfo(Number blogId)
        Return the minimal set of information on a topic, even if the current user has no access to the topic.
        Parameters:
        blogId - the ID of the topic
        Returns:
        the blog details or null if the topic does not exist

      • getUsersWithRoleAsJson

        public String getUsersWithRoleAsJson(long topicId,
                                     String role)
        Method to get a list of users with the given role from the given topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topics id.
        role - The role to get.
        Returns:
        Collection of user names encapsulated in '

      • hasChildren

        public boolean hasChildren(Long topicId)
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topics id.
        Returns:
        True, if the topic has children, else false.

      • hasExternalObjects

        public boolean hasExternalObjects(Long blogId)
        Set the external objects for this blog.
        Parameters:
        blogId - The blogs id.
        Returns:
        List of external objects.

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(long topicId,
                             String permissionIdentifier)
        Can be used to check if the current user has a specific permission on a given blog.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topics id.
        permissionIdentifier - The permission as String.
        Returns:
        True, if the current user has the given permission on the given blog.

      • isDefaultBlogEnabled

        public boolean isDefaultBlogEnabled(boolean readAccessRequired,
                                    boolean writeAccessRequired)
        Parameters:
        readAccessRequired - if true the default blog will only be enabled if the current user has read access to that blog
        writeAccessRequired - if true the default blog will only be enabled if the current user has write access to that blog
        Returns:
        whether the default blog is enabled and the given access is granted for the current user
